channel.title: Assessment Plan Model on OSCAL
channel.description: Recent content in Assessment Plan Model on OSCAL

item.title: Assessment Plan JSON Model Map
item.description: + assessment-plan: [1]{… } - assessment-plan: [1]{ id: NCName [1], + metadata: [1]{… }, - metadata: [1]{ title: markup-line [1], published: dateTime-with-timezone [0 or 1], last-modified: dateTime-with-timezone [1], version: string [1], oscal-version: string [1], + revision-history: [0 to ∞]{… }, - revision-history: [0 to ∞]{ title: markup-line [0 or 1], published: dateTime-with-timezone [0 or 1], last-modified: dateTime-with-timezone [0 or 1], version: string [0 or 1],

item.title: Assessment Plan JSON Schema Reference
item.description: Schema download oscal_assessment-plan_schema.json Schema version 1.0.0-milestone3 Short name oscal-ap The OSCAL assessment plan format is used to describe the information typically provided by an assessor during the preparation for an assessment. The root of the OSCAL assessment plan format is assessment-plan. Switch to XML activitiy-id Name Activity ID Description Links the task to a defined activity. A string property (type NCName). This object appears as a property on: task.

item.title: Assessment Plan XML Model Map
item.description: + <assessment-plan id="NCName"> [1]… </assessment-plan> - <assessment-plan id="NCName"> [1] + <metadata> [1]… </metadata> - <metadata> [1] <title>markup-line</title> [1] <published>dateTime-with-timezone</published> [0 or 1] <last-modified>dateTime-with-timezone</last-modified> [1] <version>string</version> [1] <oscal-version>string</oscal-version> [1] + <revision-history>[0 or 1]… </revision-history> - <revision-history>[0 or 1] + <revision> [1 to ∞]… </revision> - <revision> [1 to ∞] <title>markup-line</title> [0 or 1] <published>dateTime-with-timezone</published> [0 or 1] <last-modified>dateTime-with-timezone</last-modified> [0 or 1] <version>string</version> [0 or 1] <oscal-version>string</oscal-version> [0 or 1]

item.title: Assessment Plan XML Schema Reference
item.description: Schema download oscal_assessment-plan_schema.xsd Schema version 1.0.0-milestone3 Short name oscal-ap XML namespace http://csrc.nist.gov/ns/oscal/1.0 The OSCAL assessment plan format is used to describe the information typically provided by an assessor during the preparation for an assessment. The root of the OSCAL assessment plan format is assessment-plan. Switch to JSON activitiy-id Name Activity ID Description Links the task to a defined activity. An element (NCName) This element appears inside: task.
